issue.title: [CF 1178] 3+ sec frezzes when changin talents/glyphs
issue.body:
Hey. Im experiencing that nasty thing. Caused by tellmewhen 100 percents. Only with one current profile. No lua errors. Can it happen if i have about 100 icons (most of them are hidden) ? May be its overloading my WoW... Will appreciate your help.

7.4.0


> Posted by CurseForge user Ckotuna | Imported from CurseForge issue #1178 | Raw

comments.body:
Attachment Added: TellMeWhen.lua

TellMeWhen.lua


> Posted by CurseForge user Ckotuna

Got one error now randomly.

Message: ...face\AddOns\ErrorFilter\Libs\AceDB-3.0\AceDB-3.0.lua:263: bad argument #1 to 'sub' (string expected, got nil) Time: 11/19/15 03:10:17 Count: 1 Stack: [C]: in function `sub' ...face\AddOns\ErrorFilter\Libs\AceDB-3.0\AceDB-3.0.lua:263: in main chunk

Locals: (*temporary) = nil (*temporary) = 1 (*temporary) = 2 (*temporary) = "string expected, got nil"

Not sure if its linked.

Edited Nov 18, 2015

> Posted by CurseForge user Ckotuna

Please attach your saved variables, and note which profile you are experiencing these issues with.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

There may be some optimizations that can be made, but ultimately the issue here is that this single profile is larger than all the profiles for all my characters combined. The main problem is the 20x20 group. While it is indeed possible to make groups that large, TMW was never really designed around one of them getting completely filled up with icons.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

One thing you can definitely do is enable the "Warn about invalid icons" setting, and then remove all nonexistent icons that it warns about from your meta icons.

TMW contains lots of optimizations already for resolving the references from meta icons to the icons they target, but if an icon that the meta icon is looking for doesn't exist, it has to go through every single one of your icons looking for it.

By doing exactly this, I reduced the amount of time it takes to toggle config mode by nearly 2 seconds for this profile.

Edited Nov 26, 2015

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

It's about the amount of icons. You could try to make the big group a little smaller of you move some of those icons in the bottom 3 rows and then reduce there number of rows by one or two, but blank icons are already pretty well optimized so this won't make much of a noticeable difference.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Not much else that can be done. On my machine, the average icon setup time is just a hair over 1ms. It would take 3000 icons to get 3+ sec freezes - perhaps the issue just lies with your computer.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
